channel.title: Enterprise-Cloud on Sujith Quintelier
channel.description: Recent content in Enterprise-Cloud on Sujith Quintelier

item.title: github: Enterprise-wide credential management tools for incident response
item.description:
GitHub Enterprise Cloud adds enterprise-wide credential management actions for enterprise owners to use during high-impact security incident response.

  • Source: GitHub

item.title: github: GitHub Enterprise Cloud data residency in Japan is generally available
item.description:
GitHub Enterprise Cloud data residency in Japan is now generally available, letting Enterprise Cloud customers choose to store their code and repository data in Japan to support compliance, privacy, and performance needs.

  • Source: GitHub

item.title: github: Enterprise AI controls & the agent control plane are in public preview
item.description:
GitHub announced an enterprise-level experience for administrative functions for AI systems called the agent control plane, now available in public preview to all GitHub Enterprise Cloud customers using Copilot.

  • Source: GitHub

item.title: github: Managing roles and governance via enterprise teams is in public preview
item.description:
GitHub announced a public preview that expands enterprise teams’ capabilities to manage roles and governance in enterprise accounts, building on last month’s preview that enabled managing Copilot Business licenses.

  • Source: GitHub

item.title: github: GitHub Enterprise license history tracking now available in public preview
item.description:
GitHub Enterprise admins can now view a history of license usage with daily snapshots of additions and removals for GitHub Enterprise Cloud; the feature is available in public preview.

  • Source: GitHub
